snippet: “A Guide to Kinship and Maybe Magic,” a Lewis Forever production, includes a film and a commentary at Dance New Amsterdam.
abstract: Brian Seibert reviews premiere of multimedia dance show A Guide to Kinship and Maybe Magic, by choreographer Isabel Lewis, at Dance New Amsterdam.
lead_paragraph: “A Guide to Kinship and Maybe Magic,” a Lewis Forever production, includes a film and a commentary at Dance New Amsterdam.

headline.seo: ‘A Guide to Kinship and Maybe Magic’ at Dance New Amsterdam
headline.main: Droll and Exaggerated, Murderous and Strange (In a Family Sort of Way)
headline.print_headline: Droll and Exaggerated, Murderous and Strange (In a Family Sort of Way)
